resources.string: Please see advertisement\n(so you help the developer)
To collaborate with a developer\njust write (email)

This game is distributed absolutely free of charge, therefore, if you want to support the developer, please view the advertisement by clicking on the \"View ads\" button, and leave a review or rating in the Play Market by clicking on the \"Other developer\'s apps\" button and selecting the game. It\'s not difficult for you, but I\'m pleased)\nGood luck to everyone!

Only 2 players take part in the game. After the countdown, each player, by clicking on his name, increases the size of his playing field and reduces the size of the opponent\'s playing field. The game continues until there is a difference of 5 touches.\nLet\'s go, champions!

The game is played by 2 or more players. The essence of the game is to stop the timer as close to 0 as possible. If there are several players with the same best score, then the game continues between the best until one winner is revealed.\nLet\'s go, champions!

The game is played by 2 or more players. The essence of the game is to score as many points as possible within a set time (5 seconds). If the game has more than one player with the best result of the round, then the game continues between the best players until the winner is revealed.\nLet\'s go, champions!

New level coming soon. Keep for updates. You can also write your wishes for the tour or suggest your own type of game in the comments to the game in the Play Market.\nLet\'s make the game better TOGETHER!
First place is the player with the most wins
In first place is the player who stopped the timer closest to 0
The first place is taken by the player who scored the most points in one round
In order to take part in online championships, you must register
After logging out of your account, you will not be able to take part in online competitions
